Message:
What can be said about
the People of the Sand is this...
If you see them, run.

The rumors say that,
should your paths
happen to cross,
your life is forfeit.

That’s why no one dares
step close to their territory.

But, after years of research,
we learned that in their territory
lies the mythic oasis,
which was thought to be
only a mirage.

Yes—the key to salvaging
our country’s future.

Someday soon, this country
will dry into a basin of dust,
becoming uninhabitable.

So, it’s our mission
as researchers to find that oasis
before it’s too late...

Honestly, going there
is the last thing
I want to do...
The mere thought
makes me shiver...

But, this is a necessary step
to salvaging our country’s future.
I won’t back down
until I find that oasis,
no matter what...!
